Article Title: Is Victor Wembanyama alright? San Antonio Spurs star hit with injury concern after colliding with Giannis Antetokounmpo
Article Text:
Victor Wembanyama. Image via: Getty Images

What happened to Victor Wembanyama in the San Antonio Spurs Vs. Milwaukee Bucks Game?



Victor Wembanyama enters the Spurs game against the Bucks with a new haircut



The San Antonio Spurs were forced into an uneasy wait on Thursday night after Victor Wembanyama exited early against the Milwaukee Bucks. The game is crucial for both teams in the Western Conference race, but the concern arose when the Spurs‚Äô franchise star headed to the locker room within the opening minutes.Wembanyama‚Äôs status quickly became the central storyline inside the arena. With no immediate update from the team, all eyes turned to the bench as San Antonio continued play without its most impactful presence on the floor.The injury occurred with 9:18 remaining in the first quarter. While defending a driving Giannis Antetokounmpo near the basket, Victor Wembanyama appeared to make knee-to-knee contact. He dropped to the floor, grabbed his right knee, and showed visible discomfort before rising.Wembanyama limped off the court unassisted and moved quickly toward the locker room. Members of the Spurs medical staff followed, along with Spurs CEO R.C. Buford. The team later listed him as questionable to return, though no further details were shared during the game.The play sparked concern due to recent history. On December 31, Wembanyama suffered a hyperextended knee against the New York Knicks on a similar sequence.He returned to the bench that night but missed the next two games. Thursday‚Äôs incident looked eerily familiar, even as the Spurs avoided speculation and waited for medical evaluation.San Antonio entered the matchup at 27-13, while Milwaukee arrived at 17-23. The Spurs have managed Wembanyama‚Äôs workload carefully this season after he missed multiple weeks earlier, making any knee-related issue an immediate priority.Before the injury scare, Wembanyama had already drawn attention for a different reason. He arrived with a shaved head, a look that sparked conversation across the league. The change followed San Antonio‚Äôs recent blowout loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder.According to Keldon Johnson, the decision came from a shared moment between teammates. ‚ÄúVic was like, ‚ÄòYo, let‚Äôs bald our head.‚Äô And I was like, ‚ÄòLet‚Äôs do it,'‚Äù Johnson said. ‚ÄúI was trying to make sure everything went smooth, take my time‚Ä¶I had to fade it up a little bit at first. Then I gave him a little bowl cut and then we went from there.‚ÄùThe haircut carried echoes of Wembanyama‚Äôs offseason in China, where he trained with Shaolin monks and shaved his head during that period. He previously described that experience as putting his ‚Äúbody through things that it‚Äôs not used to doing and allowing my range of movement and strength.‚ÄùThat phase coincided with one of the most productive stretches of his career. After starting the 2025-26 season, Wembanyama averaged 24 points, 11 rebounds, and 3 assists.Also Read: New York Knicks injury update: How long Jalen Brunson may be sidelined after ankle sprain
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama limped off in the first quarter against the milwaukee bucks. The san antonio spurs star appeared to make knee-to-knee contact with giannis antetokounmpo. The team listed him as questionable to return, though no further details were shared.

Article Title: Billy Gunn and Paula Heaney-Sopp combined net worth in 2025: AEW role, WWE history, and overall earnings
Article Text:
Billy Gunn and Paula Heaney-Sopp (Image Source: Pinterest)

Billy Gunn‚Äôs wrestling career details and financial history

Paula Heaney-Sopp‚Äôs contributions and net worth of the couple

Billy Gunn, whose real name is Monty Kip Sopp, is a professional wrestler with a long and distinguished career spanning more than 30 years. His current net worth is estimated at $3 million to $5 million, attributable to his contributions to AEW and WWE. Billy Gunn's wife, Paula Heaney-Sopp, who has been married to him since 2009 and is not directly involved in wrestling, plays a significant behind-the-scenes role in developing the family‚Äôs brand identity.Billy's earnings are primarily from his WWE career. He received the most recognition in the 1990s, when he was part of the tag team The Smoking Gunns, and later, in one of his legendary roles, he worked with Road Dogg as part of The New Age Outlaws. When he joined AEW, Gunn initially served as a coach, but soon returned to the ring as a wrestler, teaming up with Max Caster and Anthony Bowens as The Acclaimed and winning the AEW World Trios Championship.In spite of health challenges in 2025, including major surgeries and back stress fractures, he continues to be a well-respected old-timer who sometimes takes the stage while doing his coaching work at the same time.AEW's contract with Billy, who has an annual value of about $500,000, screams for revenue into one's income already augmented by WWE royalties and appearances.Paula‚Äôs role in the company primarily involved social media engagement, content creation in the lifestyle category, and support for promotions for Gunn and their wrestlers‚Äô sons, Austin and Colten. Although her personal net worth is minimal compared with Gunn's, estimated at roughly six figures, the latter still clearly signals her presence in the digital media and brand support space.According to estimates, the wealth of the couple in the year 2025 will be approximately $5-6 million, which will be supported by the financial base established through Gunn's WWE and AEW career, plus the efforts of Paula, which not only strengthen the family's overall brand equity but also make it more visible. Their alliance, ultimately, reflects how hard-won victories, when combined with effective branding and backing, can lead to long-term profitability and market acceptance.
Article Summary: Billy gunn, whose real name is monty kip sopp, is a professional wrestler with a long and distinguished career spanning more than 30 years. His current net worth is estimated at $3 million to $5 million, attributable to his contributions to aew and wwe.

Article Title: Kik√© Hern√°ndez shares a tender family moment as daughter Penelope celebrates a special milestone
Article Text:
Kike Hernandez with his daughter Penelope (Image via: Kike Hernandez's IG)

How Kik√© Hern√°ndez shared a meaningful family moment featuring daughter Penelope

(Image via: Kike Hernandez's IG Story)

For a player whose career has been defined by big hits, postseason pressure, and high-energy moments on the diamond, Kik√© Hern√°ndez‚Äôs latest Instagram Story shifted attention to something far more personal. The MLB star shared a soft, family-focused image of his daughter Penelope, accompanied by the caption, ‚ÄúThe princess turns 5 days.‚ÄùThe post was brief but deeply warm, offering fans a glimpse into a quieter side of his life. In an era where athletes often highlight only their professional achievements online, Hern√°ndez‚Äôs update stood out for its simplicity.Kik√© Hern√°ndez and his wife, Mariana Vicente, became parents in January 2021 when they welcomed their daughter Penelope Isabel. At the time, Hern√°ndez marked the moment with an emotional Instagram announcement that revealed just how profoundly fatherhood changed his perspective on life and success.‚Äú01.15.21! Pen√©lope Isabel was born at 4:28pm. BEST DAY OF MY LIFE!!!‚Äù Hern√°ndez wrote while sharing photos of himself with his newborn daughter. He reflected on the biggest milestones of his professional journey, from being drafted to making his Major League debut and winning the World Series, before admitting that none of those moments compared to becoming a father.‚ÄúThe day I got drafted I thought I was on top of the world, the day I made my Big League debut I thought nothing would compare, the day I got married I felt like the world stopped, the day we won the World Series I thought I had it all; NOTHING compares to the moment when I met my little girl!!‚ÄùThat sense of gratitude and emotional grounding has remained a consistent theme in Hern√°ndez‚Äôs life ever since. Later in 2021, Vicente offered her own heartfelt tribute on Father‚Äôs Day, giving fans a glimpse into their family dynamic away from baseball. ‚ÄúWitnessing you become a dad is one of the best feelings in the world!‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúYou really are the funnest (and finest ü§§) most loving girl dad. We are so lucky.‚ÄùCurrently, the Hernandez family is preparing for another meaningful chapter. The couple will have a second child in this year. Although Hernandez keeps on appending chapters to his career in the MLB, incidents such as this make fans remember that his most treasured achievements are at home, influenced by family, love, and soft celebrations in a series of posts one by one.
Article Summary: Kik√© hern√°ndez and his wife, mariana vicente, became parents in january 2021. The mlb star shared a soft, family-focused image of his daughter penelope. The couple will have a second child in this year.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes injury update: Chiefs quarterback sets early goal for return after ACL surgery
Article Text: Patrick Mahomes shared his first update after undergoing ACL surgery, saying his recovery is progressing well and that his goal is to be ready for Week 1 of the 2026 season. While acknowledging the long rehab ahead, the Kansas City Chiefs star remains optimistic, hopes to take part in OTAs, and has ruled out retirement.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes says he hopes to be ready for week 1 of the 2026 season. The kansas city chiefs star has ruled out retirement. Mahomes had acl surgery on his left knee earlier this month. He hopes to take part in otas and is optimistic about his recovery.

Article Title: Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt makes a heartfelt update about her life amid team‚Äôs disappointing season
Article Text:
Gracie Hunt opens up about her life.(Image via courtesy of The Kansas City Chiefs/Sydney Schneider)

Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, makes a wholesome post amid the team‚Äôs poor run on the field



Gracie Hunt has been public about how Derek Green changed her life



The Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been a constant source of strength and support to the team, through all the good and the bad days.With the Kansas City Chiefs wrapping up the season with a pretty poor performance on the field, 26 year old billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt has not let it affect her.A few days ago, Gracie Hunt, took to her social media to post a few glimpses from her life as she posed in a stunning red colored dress which she paired with a chic bag from Christian Dior.As she posed with her friends, Gracie Hunt‚Äôs caption has moved fans.The caption of the wholesome post reads as, ‚ÄúThe kind of moments that stay with you ‚ú® Not because they were loud or perfect, but because they were real.‚ÄùThe 26 year old billionaire heiress added, ‚ÄúLife isn‚Äôt measured by what‚Äôs next, but by how present & intentional we are where we are. I hope you guys have a great day!‚ÄùGracie Hunt‚Äôs inspirational words come at a time when many of the star players of the team are getting brutally trolled by fans.Away from the field, the billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt has also been pretty open about her personal life and her public relationship with Derek Green.A few months ago, Gracie Hunt opened up about how Derek Green changed her life.Gracie Hunt spoke to PEOPLE as she said, ‚ÄúDerek and I have known each other our whole lives‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe 26 year old billionaire heiress added, ‚ÄúWe would actually play together as babies during the Chiefs‚Äô Christmas parties every year, and then we reconnected as adults in 2017 and met on the sidelines pregame‚Ä¶‚ÄùGracie Hunt continued, ‚ÄúWe reconnected in early March and have been inseparable ever since.‚ÄùDerek Green has been spotted at almost all the matches of the Kansas City Chiefs being there for Gracie Hunt and her family as the team recorded an average run on the field this time.Also Read: Travis Kelce makes an emotional choice in his life alongside Taylor Swift ahead of their big day amid retirement rumors
Article Summary: Gracie hunt has always been a constant source of strength and support to the team. The 26 year old billionaire heiress has also been pretty open about her personal life and her public relationship with derek green. A few days ago, gracie hunt, took to her social media to post a few glimpses from her life.

Article Title: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre the best teammate‚Äù: George Kittle breaks silence with a heartfelt note for wife Claire Kittle amid his brutal injury
Article Text:
George Kittle speaks out with emotional message to wife Claire Kittle.(Image via Getty Images)

George Kittle appreciates his wife, Claire Kittle, for standing by him



When will George Kittle be able to return to the field?



George Kittle, the San Francisco 49ers‚Äô star player, sparked panic when he ended up with a brutal Achilles tear on Sunday at the match against the Philadelphia Eagles.Though the San Francisco 49ers ended up winning the match even after losing George Kittle, fans remain stressed about his recovery. Amid this, the star player has shared a heartfelt note for his wife, Claire Kittle, as she stands by him.A few hours ago, George Kittle‚Äôs wife, Claire Kittle, took to her Instagram to share a few pictures of George Kittle getting injured as she expressed how scared she was and how painful it has been.While fans were moved by the post, George Kittle commented, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre the best teammate for this journey.‚ÄùGeorge Kittle‚Äôs wife, Claire Kittle, has been a strong source of strength and support to the star player and has often been spotted at all matches cheering him on.The caption of the post that Claire Kittle made, reads as, ‚ÄúDisbelief and stillness were all I felt as I yelled, get up, get up, over and over again. He always gets up. He‚Äôs George ‚Äî he can do all things. He just does it.Claire Kittle added, ‚ÄúI love this man with everything I have in me. He is a unicorn in this world, and he will be back stronger and better than ever before. The mind of a heartbroken athlete is a determined one‚Ä¶‚ÄùAt this point in time, George Kittle will not be able to come back to the field this season as medical experts say it will take him ‚Äú9 to 12 months‚Äù at least to fully recover.The San Francisco 49ers‚Äô coach, Kyle Shanahan, spoke about George Kittle‚Äôs injury after the match as he said, ‚ÄúLosing Kittle early in the game, it was obviously a depressing play for everybody. Once I heard on the headset, just going over there, just felt horrible for Kittle.‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúJake [Tonges] and Luke [Farrell] had stepped it up for us all year so. So I think the guys had a lot of confidence in those guys that they could still do it. But I think everyone‚Äôs just hurting for Kittle.‚ÄùAlso Read: Travis Kelce makes an emotional choice in his life alongside Taylor Swift ahead of their big day amid retirement rumors
Article Summary: George kittle, the san francisco 49ers‚Äô star player, sparked panic when he ended up with a brutal achilles tear on sunday at the match against the philadelphia eagles. The star player has shared a heartfelt note for his wife, claire, as she stands by him. Medical experts say it will take him ‚Äú9 to 12 months‚Äù at least to fully recover.

Article Title: NHL Injury Update: Nashville Predators defenseman Adam Wilsby to remain away from club after suffering a lower-body injury
Article Text:
Nashville Predators' Adam Wilsby in a defensive mode during the third period of an NHL hockey game Sunday, Jan. 11, 2026, in Nashville, Tenn. (AP Photo/Mark Humphrey)

Adam Wilsby to remain away from the Nashville Predators owing to a major lower-body injury

Also read:

The Nashville Predators will be playing without defenseman Adam Wilsby, as he has suffered a lower-body injury recently. This means that he will not be seen in action on Friday night‚Äôs road matchup against the Colorado Avalanche and potentially longer.As per reports, the defenseman snapped a 10-game scoring drought Tuesday with an assist in a 4-3 loss in Edmonton. However, Wilsby has a goal and six assists in 36 games this season. If he is unable to play on Friday, there is a possibility that Nicolas Hague will enter the lineup.However, it‚Äôs unclear how the defenseman sustained the injury. Reports suggest that, despite the injury, he played 21:30 of ice time in the loss to the Oilers, well above his average of 16:59 per game in 2025-26 and 17:25 across his 60 NHL games. Nashville Predators defenseman has recently suffered a lower-body injury, which prompted him to not participate in the upcoming Friday night‚Äôs road matchup against the Colorado Avalanche and potentially longer. This was reported on Thursday by Alex Daugherty of The Tennessean.He reported that the blueliner is sidelined day-to-day with a lower-body injury, with little update on whether or not he will make the trip to Denver for the first of back-to-back road games.After taking on the Avalanche, the Predators make their way to Nevada for a Saturday night clash with the Vegas Golden Knights.As per reports, Wilsby has already played the most NHL games in a single season of his career in 2025-26, surpassing the 23 he played on a struggling Predators team in 2024-25, while he split his time between the NHL club and AHL affiliate, the Milwaukee Admirals.In this season, Wilsby has a goal and six assists in 36 games. In his 60 games, following his 2024-25 debut, he has two goals and 12 points, all with the Predators.Regarding his background, he was the 101st overall pick in the fourth round of the 2020 NHL Draft. Wilsby also played parts of three seasons in the AHL, after spending four seasons in the top division of Swedish hockey with Skelleftea AIK.As per their current standing, the Predators sat fourth in the Western Conference Wild Card race with 48 points, one point behind the San Jose Sharks, who held the conference‚Äôs final spot in the Stanley Cup Playoffs. After the two consecutive games and their upcoming matches against Colorado and Vegas, the Predators will have three consecutive home games against the Buffalo Sabres, Ottawa Senators, and Utah Mammoth.
Article Summary: Nashville predators defenseman adam wilsby has suffered a lower-body injury. This means that he will not be seen in action on friday night‚Äôs road matchup against the colorado avalanche and potentially longer. If he is unable to play on friday, there is a possibility that nicolas hague will enter the lineup.

Article Title: Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic (1-15-2026) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, injury report, prediction, and more
Article Text:
Paolo Banchero of Orlando Magic and Ja Morant of Memphis Grizzlies (Photo by Joe Murphy/NBAE via Getty Images)

Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic : Head-to-Head



Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic: When and where to watch

Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic: Expected Lineups

Memphis Grizzlies:

Point Guard: Cam Spencer

Shooting Guard: Jaylen Wells

Small Forward: Cedric Coward

Power Forward: Jaren Jackson Jr.

Center: Jock Landale

Orlando Magic:

Point Guard: Anthony Black

Shooting Guard: Desmond Bane

Small Forward: Franz Wagner

Power Forward: Paolo Banchero

Center: Wendell Carter Jr.

Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic: Injury Report

Memphis Grizzlies:

Ja Morant - OUT ( right calf contusion)

Zach Edey - OUT (ankle)

Ty Jerome - OUT (calf)

Brandon Clarke - OUT (calf)

Scotty Pippen Jr. - OUT (toe recovery)

Orlando Magic:

Jalen Suggs - OUT (knee)

Collin Castleton - OUT (thumb)

Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic: Match Prediction

The NBA goes international this week as the Memphis Grizzlies and Orlando Magic are set to lock horns for their next match in Berlin‚Äôs Uber Arena on Thursday, initiating a three-year slate between the NBA and Europe. This match will be the league's first regular-season match in Germany. Following this, both teams will clash in London for their next meetup.The Grizzlies are fresh out of a win against the Nets by 103-98 after two consecutive losses to Suns and Thunder. They are currently 10th in the West with a record of 17-22. The report card for Magic is not so different. After their 91-103 loss against the 76ers on January 10th, Magic registered a dominating 128-118 win against the Pelicans on Monday night. They are currently 6th in the East with a record of 22-18.The Grizzlies and Magic have played a total of 57 regular-season games, with the Grizzlies clinching victory in 31 of those. In their last 8 meetups, the Magic managed to register only one win over the Grizzlies.The regular-season clash is scheduled for Thursday, January 15, 2026. The game will tip off at 2:00 PM ET (12:30 AM IST on Friday). For fans in Berlin, the local start time is 8:00 PM CET.Fans in the United States can stream the game live exclusively on Amazon Prime Video. While the international viewers can catch the action via NBA League Pass.The Grizzlies are expected to lean on their youthful backcourt in the absence of veteran stars.The Magic welcome back a key piece of their core for this special international fixture.The Orlando enters as the favorite, largely due to the return of Franz Wagner and the significant injury woes plaguing the Memphis rotation. While Jaren Jackson Jr. remains a dominant defensive force, the Grizzlies may struggle to find consistent scoring without Morant.The Magic in 40 games has averaged 116.2 points per game, while the Grizzlies are close by with 114.9 points in 39 games. The Wagner brothers, Moritz and Franz, will provide Magic with a home advantage. Orlando‚Äôs defensive depth should allow them to control the tempo. Final Score Prediction: Orlando Magic 117, Memphis Grizzlies 111.Also read: From Memphis to Miami? Ja Morant‚Äôs $3.2 million lavish Miami mansion fuels trade chaos
Article Summary: The nba goes international this week as the memphis grizzlies and orlando magic are set to lock horns for their next match in berlin‚Äôs uber arena on thursday. This match will be the league's first regular-season match in germany. The grizzlies are fresh out of a win against the nets by 103-98 after two consecutive losses to suns and thunder.

Article Title: Mark Stone's exceptional goal within 25 seconds of overtime marks Vegas Golden Knights' 5th winning streak
Article Text:
Vegas Golden Knights vs Los Angeles Kings (via Getty Images)

Jack Eichel's and Mitch Marner 's timely scoring punches added to Vegas Golden Knights' historic win

Golden Knights vs. Kings | NHL Highlights | January 14, 2026

Mark Stone scored just 25 seconds into overtime as the Vegas Golden Knights overcame the Los Angeles Kings with a score of 3-2. The win marked a successful performance for the team, extending their win streak to five as they continue to rise in the NHL playoff standings.Mark Stone capped the scoring with a goal and an assist, while Jack Eichel contributed three assists as Vegas extended its record to 22-11-12. Akira Schmid recorded 22 saves for the Golden Knights, who are now 5-0-1 within the current six games. The Los Angeles team got a point but yet struggled again in sealing victories for a closely contested match.The game-winning moment happened rapidly in overtime. Jack Eichel led a rush into the offensive zone, putting pressure on Kings goaltender Darcy Kuemper to commit. The Golden Knights seem to be leaning on their top line for many of the chances they are getting during this winning streak, with Stone and Eichel often getting into the danger area of the ice.The Vegas Golden Knights opened the scoring about a third of the way through the second period as Braeden Bowman snapped a wrist shot over Kuemper‚Äôs left shoulder. The goal ended a 17-game goal-scoring drought for Bowman and illustrated the depth of the Vegas roster, one that extends beyond its stars.The Kings tied it early in the third period, but Mitch Marner scored again at 12:07 with a wrist shot into the far corner after he skated into the slot.‚ÄúI kind of had a lot of time to decide what I was going to do, so at first there, I was deciding to maybe take a slap shot, maybe get a tip play," Marner said. "And then I saw both guys go to (Tomas) Hertl and (Ivan Barbashev), so I kind of walked in and was lucky enough to pick my spot."Eichel assisted on all three Vegas goals and extended his point streak to six games. The Golden Knights and Kings have also reached a total of 18 overtime games this season, a league-high number, indicating just how small a matter winning or losing is at this stage of the playoff competition.Also read: Vegas Golden Knights and Mark Stone look to extend their winning streak as they welcome St. Louis Blues
Article Summary: Mark stone scored just 25 seconds into overtime as the vegas golden knights overcame the los angeles kings with a score of 3-2. The win marked a successful performance for the team, extending their win streak to five as they continue to rise in the nhl playoff standings.

Article Title: UAE set for a historic Winter Olympics 2026 debut with two Alpine Skiers in Italy
Article Text:
Piera Hudson (via Getty)

UAE leaders hail breakthrough moment for winter sports



The United Arab Emirates are set to create history next month by competing at the Winter Olympics for the first time! The nation will send two Alpine skiers to the 2026 Winter Games in Italy, marking a major milestone for Emirati sport. Until now, the UAE had only appeared at the Winter Youth Olympic Games and not the main Olympic event.Alex Estridge and Piera Hudson will represent the UAE at the Games, which will be held in Milan and Cortina from February 6 to 22. Their participation was officially announced on Thursday during a press conference at the UAE National Olympic Committee headquarters in Dubai, confirming a breakthrough moment for winter sports in the country.Hamel Al Qubaisi, vice-president of the UAE Winter Sports Federation, described the announcement as the result of years of effort. He said the federation is proud of the progress made and excited to see Emirati athletes compete on the Olympic stage. He added that the UAE‚Äôs participation in the 2026 Winter Olympic Games is a historic achievement and shows that sport in the country is not limited by geography or climate, but driven by ambition and a vision for global excellence.The opening ceremony will be unique, with events taking place across four locations. Estridge will carry the UAE flag in Milan, while Hudson will serve as flagbearer in Cortina, underlining the significance of the moment for both athletes.Estridge, who is just 19, is a prodigy of the UAE‚Äôs growing winter sports system. He learned to ski at Ski Dubai and first took up the sport at the age of three. He later began racing competitively and has represented the UAE at several youth events. Speaking last year, he explained that he has lived in Dubai his whole life, learned to ski locally, raced for the first time at seven, and recently competed at the Youth Olympics in Gangwon.Hudson, 29, brings international experience to the team. She previously represented New Zealand before switching her sporting nationality to the UAE in June 2025.Al Qubaisi also pointed to earlier achievements, including participation in the Winter Youth Olympic Games 2024, the Special Olympics World Winter Games Turin 2025, and the Asian Winter Games 2025. He said these events proved the UAE can develop high-level winter athletes.UAE skiers have benefited from international training programmes, including the FIS Development Programme in Switzerland. The country also became an official member of the International Ski and Snowboard Federation in September 2024.Around 2,900 athletes from across the world will compete at the Games, with 114 medals on offer across eight sports and 16 disciplines.Also Read: Katie Ledecky Sends early warning ahead of LA 2028 Olympic Games with stunning 1500m win at the Pro Swim Series Austin
Article Summary: Uae will send two skiers to the 2026 winter games in italy. Until now, the uae had only appeared at the winter youth olympic games. Alex estridge and piera hudson will represent the uae at the games. The games will be held in milan and cortina from february 6 to 22.

Article Title: Katie Ledecky sends early warning ahead of LA 2028 Olympic Games with stunning 1500m win at the Pro Swim Series in Austin
Article Text: Katie Ledecky sends early warning ahead of LA 2028 Olympic Games with stunning 1500m win at the Pro Swim Series in Austin

Article Title: Drake Maye‚Äôs gesture of allowing a female reporter to ask the first question is reminiscent of Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Drake Maye and Mike Vrabel)

Helping women in sports

Females should be in the kitchen

What a leader and gentleman

Like coach, like quarterback. Not just on the gridiron but off the field too. New England Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel let reporter Teresa Walker ask the first question at press conferences when he coached the Tennessee Titans [2018-2023]. Vrabel reportedly continued this tradition with Patriots columnist for MassLive Sports, Karen Guregian, in New England.Following the coach‚Äôs example, Patriots quarterback Drake Maye also did something heartfelt. MLFootball recently shared footage of Maye letting a female reporter to ask the first question at his press conference.MLFootball captioned the X post: ‚ÄúCLASS ACT: #Patriots quarterback Drake Maye has taken on the tradition of his head coach Mike Vrabel of allowing a female reporter ask the first question at his press conference. [clapping hands emoji] Coach Vrabel has been doing this for many years, helping women in sports.‚ÄùIn October 2025, MLFootball shared a video collage of Vrabel from his press conferences with the Titans. They captioned the X post:‚ÄúCLASS ACT #Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel always let reporter Teresa Walker ask the first question at pressers because Mike knows how hard it is for women in sports. [two clapping hands emoji] Mike has now continued that tradition in New England with Karen Guregian.‚ÄùNow, such a heartwarming and even touching moment, but how do cybercitizens react? Their reactions are mixed. Let‚Äôs find out.To Mike Vrabel‚Äôs class act: ‚ÄúEquality?‚Äù one X user questioned. Another said, ‚ÄúSounds discriminatory.‚Äù A third added, ‚ÄúLove this. We gotta do everything we can to support women in sports. Couldn‚Äôt have said it better myself.‚ÄùA fourth user said, ‚ÄúFunny how being a decent human is seen as rare enough to be newsworthy‚Ä¶ men really set the bar in hell again.‚Äù A fifth added, ‚ÄúFemales should be in the kitchen!‚ÄùTo Drake Maye‚Äôs class act: ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs my quarterback,‚Äù declared one X user. Another wrote, ‚ÄúHow can you root against guys like Maye and Vrabel?‚ÄùA third user said, ‚ÄúWow, that‚Äôs amazing. I have never seen anything like this in my lifetime.‚Äù A fourth added, ‚ÄúHard to not root for this guy. What a leader and gentleman.‚Äù A fifth wrote, ‚ÄúClass act and a sportsman.‚ÄùAlso Read: Reportedly throwing shade? Patriots QB Drake Maye says he has never met Chargers QB Justin Herbert
Article Summary: New england patriots head coach mike vrabel let reporter teresa walker ask the first question at press conferences when he coached the tennessee titans. Patriots quarterback drake maye also did something heartfelt. Mlfootball recently shared footage of maye letting a female reporter to ask thefirst question at his press conference.

Article Title: Pittsburgh Penguins make a young fan‚Äôs dream come true with a special one-day contract through Make-A-Wish Foundation
Article Text:
A lifetime moment for Myer Gallant with Sidney Crosby (Image via: Twitter)

A day in the life of an NHL player: Pittsburgh Penguins create a memorable experience for Myer Gallant



For 10-year-old Myer Gallant, a lifelong Pittsburgh Penguins fan from O‚ÄôLeary, Prince Edward Island, Wednesday was unforgettable. Diagnosed with spinal muscular atrophy (SMA), a genetic disease that affects the nervous system and muscles, Myer has faced challenges far beyond his age. Yet, thanks to the Penguins and the Make-A-Wish Foundation, he got a taste of NHL life, signing a special one-day contract with the team.Myer‚Äôs first reaction upon seeing the contract placed on the table by Penguins general manager Kyle Dubas was pure surprise. ‚ÄúShocked,‚Äù he said simply. The special day allowed him to meet some of his favorite players, including Sidney Crosby and Ryan Graves, both fellow Maritimers, making the experience even more personal and memorable as well.Dubas emphasized the broader impact of moments like these. ‚ÄúTo be able to give back to people who make that level of investment in the Penguins is something that I think we‚Äôre always thrilled to do,‚Äù he said. For the Penguins, this gesture was a chance to give back. Crosby shared the experience with warmth. ‚ÄúBeing a fellow Maritimer, it‚Äôs pretty cool. Hope he enjoys the day,‚Äù he said, highlighting the bond shared across generations and regions.Graves, recently recalled from Wilkes-Barre/Scranton of the AHL, spent time trading gifts with Myer, receiving homemade treats in return. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a great kid. It‚Äôs special to be part of something like that,‚Äù Graves said, noting how the day puts professional athletes‚Äô own routines into perspective.Myer enjoyed a locker room breakfast, wore Crosby‚Äôs No. 87 jersey, and observed practice from the glass. Autographs and a press conference with Dubas completed the day, leaving memories that will last a lifetime. Parents Randy and Jaclyn Gallant watched their son‚Äôs joy unfold. ‚ÄúWhen he got here, and he‚Äôd seen his jersey, it was something else,‚Äù Randy said.Even amid the Penguins‚Äô recent on-ice struggles, moments like Myer‚Äôs visit show the impact the team can have beyond the rink. Dubas believes that while the season naturally has its highs and lows, experiences like these serve as a meaningful reminder of the difference the organization can make. For Myer, the day was far more than just a hockey experience, rather it‚Äôs a lifetime moment for a dedicated fan.
Article Summary: Myer gallant, 10, was diagnosed with spinal muscular atrophy (sma) the pittsburgh penguins and make-a-wish foundation teamed up to give myer a day in the life of an nhl player. Myer met some of his favorite players, including sidney crosby and ryan graves.

Article Title: Islam Makhachev open to super fight with lightweight champion Ilia Topuria but reveals this one clear condition
Article Text:
Islam Makhachev gives clear verdict on Jon Jones vs. Daniel Cormier wrestling clash as rivalry sparks again (Image Via Getty)

Islam Makhachev welcomes the fight against Ilia Topuria but refuses to move down



Islam Makhachev has not closed the door on a blockbuster fight against Ilia Topuria. The matchup is already being seen as one of the biggest fights the UFC can put together. Both men are champions. Both are elite, and both believe they are the best fighters in the world right now.Makhachev is the current welterweight champion after moving up from lightweight. Topuria, meanwhile, holds the lightweight title and is also a former featherweight champion. The two have exchanged verbal shots for months. Makhachev sits at No. 1 in the UFC pound-for-pound rankings, with Topuria close behind at No. 2.Islam Makhachev recently spoke to Match TV about the possible fight. He made it clear that he is not against the idea. He said he has no issue with fighting Ilia Topuria if it makes sense. However, the Russian star stressed that he will not drop back down in weight.Makhachev explained that he already ruled the lightweight division. He said nobody defeated him there. He added that he gave up the belt on his own and moved up for new challenges. Going back down just to fight for another belt does not excite him.In his view, if Topuria truly wants the fight, he should be the one moving up to welterweight.Makhachev also pointed out that the risk is lower for Topuria. He suggested that Topuria can afford to take the chance. If Topuria loses at welterweight, he can simply return to lightweight and continue defending his title. Makhachev agreed that the fight would mean more for Topuria than for him, saying his own chapter at lightweight is already closed.The welterweight champion also believes Topuria still has unfinished business at lightweight. He feels Topuria has yet to fully prove himself in that division. Makhachev mentioned that Arman Tsarukyan keeps calling Topuria out and is eager for a title fight.Meanwhile, Jack Della Maddalena has shared his view on the potential matchup. Makhachev defeated Maddalena at UFC 322 to win the welterweight belt. Speaking on N3on‚Äôs stream, Maddalena leaned toward Makhachev winning. He felt Makhachev‚Äôs size would play a big role. Still, he did not dismiss Topuria. He noted that Topuria hits very hard and could be dangerous if the fight stays standing. Maddalena believes it would be an exciting fight and one the fans deserve to see.Also Read: ‚ÄúI‚Äôll be champion of world‚Äù- Ian Machado Garry sends strong warning to Islam Makhachev ahead of possible UFC title fight
Article Summary: Islam makhachev is the current welterweight champion after moving up from lightweight. Ilia topuria holds the lightweight title and is also a former featherweight champion. The two have exchanged verbal shots for months. Jack della maddalena believes it would be an exciting fight.

What to Watch Tonight's Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic Game (January 15, 2026)

Theplay the Orlando Magic in Berlin on January 15, 2026. It is a regular-season game on an international stage, but Memphis will again be without its starting point guard.and will miss his sixth straight game. He is still dealing with a right calf contusion and has not returned to game action despite recent progress.Ja Morant last played on January 2. The same calf issue sidelined him earlier this season for 10 games, and it has now kept him out for five more leading into the Berlin matchup.He practiced recently and traveled with the team to Europe, which led to some uncertainty around his availability. Early listings had him as questionable, but final reports confirmed he would not play. Head coach Tuomas Iisalo has indicated that Morant could return on January 18 in London, provided his recovery continues as planned.Memphis Grizzlies enter the game at 17-22, sitting 10th in the Western Conference. The team has struggled to find consistency, especially when Morant has been in and out of the lineup.In 18 games this season, the Grizzlies are 6-12 with Morant playing.He is averaging 19 points and 7.6 assists, but his shooting numbers are down, including career-low marks from the field and from three-point range. With several other guards and rotation players injured, his absence leaves Memphis thin in the backcourt again.Both teams arrive in Berlin missing key players.With Ja Morant out, Jaren Jackson Jr. takes on a larger role for Memphis Grizzlies at both ends of the floor. Orlando, meanwhile, gets Franz Wagner back, which helps stabilize its rotation.Also read: Memphis Grizzlies vs Orlando Magic injury report: Injured and questionable players, head-to-head records, team stats, and more (January 15, 2026) There is also ongoing discussion about possible roster changes in Memphis before the February 5 trade deadline. Some view Morant‚Äôs careful management as part of a larger strategy. However, his travel with the team indicates that the Grizzlies still anticipate his return soon. For now, the focus remains on getting through the Berlin game without him.
Article Summary: Memphis grizzlies guard ja morant has been ruled out with a right calf contusion. He practiced recently and traveled with the team to europe, which led to some uncertainty around his availability. Memphis grizzlies enter the game at 17-22, sitting 10th in the western conference.

Article Title: Tom Brady‚Äôs comeback plan takes shape as Rob Gronkowski reveals his true intentions
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Rob Gronkowski on Tom Brady RETURN for 2028 Olympics & Mike Tomlin Joining Him on Fox Sundays??



Rob Gronkowski opens up on Tom Brady making a comeback

Also Read:

Tom Brady may have officially retired from the NFL, but the idea of seeing him back on the field is no longer just fan speculation. Comments from his longtime teammate Rob Gronkowski have added fuel to the fire, suggesting that Brady‚Äôs next chapter in football could be more serious than many believed.Speaking on Up & Adams, Gronkowski made it clear that Tom Brady is not joking about returning to competitive football through flag football events. According to Gronkowski, Brady is ‚Äú100 percent serious‚Äù about using upcoming tournaments as a testing ground, with his eyes firmly set on a possible Olympic appearance.Brady is set to headline the Fanatics Flag Football Classic, scheduled to take place in Saudi Arabia. While the event is being promoted as an exhibition, Gronkowski believes it carries much bigger meaning for the seven-time Super Bowl champion.The logic is simple. Flag football removes heavy contact, allowing quarterbacks to rely on arm strength, accuracy, preparation and game IQ all areas where Brady still excels. Gronkowski pointed out that if Brady performs well and feels physically comfortable, the door to a larger comeback will swing open.What truly stood out was Gronkowski‚Äôs suggestion that Brady could push for a spot with Team USA when flag football makes its Olympic debut at the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics. Brady will be close to 50 by then, but Gronkowski dismissed age as a concern, saying his former quarterback trains constantly and remains driven by competition.Brady himself has hinted at this mindset. During the launch of Fanatics Studios in Los Angeles, he admitted that most of his time is still spent in the gym, even after stepping away from the NFL. While he stopped short of confirming an Olympic run, he framed the next two years as a prove-it phase.Gronkowski also revealed that Brady‚Äôs habits have not changed much since retirement. He continues to train intensely, stays locked into football conversations and prepares as if he is still leading a huddle. From Gronkowski‚Äôs perspective, Brady is simply built differently.With flag football gaining global attention and the Olympics providing a massive stage, Brady‚Äôs return would not be about nostalgia. It would be about winning something that has defined his entire career.For now, all eyes will be on Brady‚Äôs performance in the Fanatics Flag Football Classic. If he looks sharp, comfortable and competitive, the chance of him playing further only increases. What once sounded unrealistic is now beginning to feel possible.
Article Summary: Tom brady is set to headline the fanatics flag football classic, scheduled to take place in saudi arabia. Rob gronkowski made it clear that brady is not joking about returning to competitive football through flag football events. Brady could push for a spot with team usa when flag football makes its olympic debut at the 2028 los angeles olympics.

Article Title: Kevin Durant weighs in on Aaron Rodgers‚Äô future as retirement speculation grows
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Kevin Durant calls Aaron Rodgers a ‚Äúgenerational athlete‚Äù

Mike Tomlin‚Äôs departure adds more uncertainty

Also Read:

As speculation around Aaron Rodgers‚Äô future continues to grow, an unexpected individual has stepped into the conversation. NBA superstar Kevin Durant has offered his perspective on the veteran quarterback‚Äôs next move, urging fans and critics alike to appreciate the bigger picture rather than rush to conclusions.Rodgers‚Äô 2025 season with the Pittsburgh Steelers ended on a difficult note. A one-sided Wild Card loss to the Houston Texans reignited questions about whether the four-time NFL MVP has reached the end of his playing days.Speaking on the Up & Adams Show, Durant made it clear that he views Rodgers‚Äô situation through a wider lens. The NBA star stressed that playing at an elite level for more than two decades is rare, especially at a demanding position like quarterback.Durant pointed out that longevity itself deserves respect. In his view, Rodgers‚Äô 21-year NFL journey speaks volumes about his discipline, preparation, and commitment to the game. Whether Rodgers returns for another season or decides to retire, Durant believes his career should not be judged by one disappointing playoff performance.The debate around Rodgers‚Äô future intensified after Pittsburgh‚Äôs early playoff exit.The loss not only ended the Steelers‚Äô season but also raised doubts about whether the team is ready to compete at a high level again in the near future.Rodgers, now 42, has not officially announced any decision. He has stated publicly that he does not want to make an ‚Äúemotional decision‚Äù and prefers to take time before deciding whether his body and mindset are ready for another long NFL season.The uncertainty surrounding him increased further after Mike Tomlin stepped down as Steelers head coach. Rodgers reportedly joined Pittsburgh largely because of his respect for Tomlin, and the coach‚Äôs exit has left major questions about the team‚Äôs future direction.With the Steelers beginning a search for a new head coach, it remains unclear what role he would play if he chooses to return. A leadership change often signals a shift in philosophy, and that could influence the quarterback‚Äôs final decision.Durant also pushed back against the idea that Rodgers would disappear from public life if he retires. He suggested that Rodgers‚Äô competitive nature and discipline would carry over into whatever comes next, whether that is media, business, or another football-related role.For now, Rodgers‚Äô future remains unresolved. But as Durant‚Äôs comments highlight, the focus may be better placed on appreciating one of football‚Äôs most accomplished careers rather than rushing toward a conclusion.
Article Summary: Kevin durant calls aaron rodgers a ‚Äúgenerational athlete‚Äôs‚Äù 21-year nfl journey speaks volumes about his discipline, preparation, and commitment to the game. Durant stressed that playing at an elite level for more than two decades is rare, especially at a demanding position like quarterback.

Article Title: What is the ‚Äúexpensive poo‚Äù incident in F1? All about Carlos Sainz‚Äôs costly and comical moment on the track
Article Text:
Carlos Sainz (Image Source: Getty)

Why has it become known as the 'expensive poo'?

FIA rules, driver backlash, and wider debate

Formula 1 is a sport of split-second accuracy, drama, and colossal fines, but a few stories have been as bizarre and discussed as the case of Carlos Sainz in Japan in 2025 during a Grand Prix. When the Williams driver was fined by the FIA for failing to sing the national anthem on the grid at Suzuka, the incident was immediately memed, joked about, and turned into a hot, debatable topic all over the paddock and in the media.Sainz gave the reason that he had been experiencing some sudden stomach problems just before the pre-race anthem, and he was rushed to the hospital, which made him arrive a few seconds late. Although stewards admitted the extenuating circumstances, a doctor confirmed the discomfort. Still, he incurred a 20,000-euro penalty under FIA rules for punctuality at official ceremonies, but later, that fine was suspended for no repeat offences.The case itself became a living one courtesy of comments from other drivers and commentators. Mercedes driver George Russell, who is also the representative of the Grand Prix Drivers‚Äô Association, jokingly said that Sainz's bathroom break had become a pretty expensive poo and that this was the ridiculousness of the situation when the call of nature conflicted with strict F1 procedures.Sainz himself responded publicly, calling the fine disproportionate because it stemmed from a five-second delay. He even joked about possible other fines after making swears during the press remarks regarding the entire affair, another rule that the FIA had become stricter on in 2025.Although it is a funny side story in the history of Formula 1, the incident involving the expensive poo highlighted the serious debate about how much regulation and reality go hand in hand in Formula 1, and that even the use of the loo can become a headliner.Along with the jokes, the incident sparked an intense discussion in Formula 1. Drivers challenged the need to enforce ceremonial rules to an extreme, leaving human realities with no space. The Grand Prix Drivers Association openly defended Sainz, saying there should be greater discretion in health-related situations.Although the incident will be remembered with a smile, it also made the tension between rigid rules and reasonable justice in modern Formula 1 clear: even an incident off-track can have an impact on the sport.Also read: F1 fans hail Max Verstappen as he is set to mark 10 years since becoming youngest Grand Prix winner
Article Summary: Carlos sainz was fined by the fia for failing to sing the national anthem on the grid at suzuka in 2025. The williams driver gave the reason that he had been experiencing some sudden stomach problems just before the pre-race anthem, and he was rushed to the hospital.

Article Title: NHL Update: Erik Gudbranson returns to Columbus Blue Jackets after long hip injury absence
Article Text:
Erik Gudbranson (Image Via Getty Images)

What does Erik Gudbranson‚Äôs return mean for Columbus Blue Jackets‚Äô defense?

After a long absence, Erik Gudbranson is now almost ready to put on the Blue Jackets jersey again. The Columbus Blue Jackets have brought the experienced defenseman back from the injured list, paving the way for him to play against the Vancouver Canucks on Thursday night. Coming back after a long rehabilitation, the coming back of the player's return is now considered as giving the team a familiar face instead of rushing him back.The Blue Jackets have confirmed the return of Gudbranson from injured reserve, and he will likely play. The 34-year-old has not been on the ice since the end of October due to chronic hip problems that required a long time off. His non-participation brought about a reshuffling of Columbus‚Äôs defensive combinations in their attempt to hold their own, and now the return of Gudbranson seems like a planned move rather than just a pushing back of the deadline.On November 6, defenseman Erik Gudbranson was placed on injured reserve, missing 38 games in a row, which makes him the longest absent player on the team. During his very brief stay on the ice, he was given a minus-two rating, with an average of almost 15 minutes of ice time being his average. However, his contribution was never intended to be in the offensive area. The Blue Jackets appreciate him for his physical strength and capability to keep the situation calm in his zone.This reappearance also has a significant personal meaning. The previous season was another tough one since Gudbranson could participate in only 16 games after undergoing shoulder surgery. Now that he is in the last year of his $4 million contract, which was signed in July 2022, the veteran player will be determined to make a significant contribution, especially in the final part of the season.Columbus is coming into this game with a record of 20 wins, 19 losses, and 7 overtime defeats, which puts them in the seventh position in the Metropolitan Division, and they are seven points behind a wild-card spot.The return of Gudbranson will not have an immediate impact on the standings, but it will provide the Blue Jackets with something they have been missing for a long time: a solid and known character on the defense. Sometimes, that is more important than the stats.Also Read: Trevor Zegras Net Worth Timeline (2016‚Äì2026): From career growth to salary, endorsements, and more
Article Summary: The columbus blue jackets have confirmed the return of erik gudbranson from injured reserve. The 34-year-old has not been on the ice since the end of october due to chronic hip problems. He will likely play against the vancouver canucks on thursday night.
